programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown - The Ultimate Cowboy: Bigger in Texas: Season two of Ultimate Cowboy Showdown kicks off with the arrival of fourteen real-life cowboys to the sprawling Texas ranch where they'll call home until only one remains. As they set up camp in the sweltering heat, they make their introductions and size up the competition. While getting better acquainted, personalities clash, and alliances form. In the first of many challenges, the cowboys work in teams to sort gold-tagged cattle from a mixed herd. When miscommunication affects a team's performance, they have to answer to Trace. After consulting with two expert judges, Trace eliminates the team member who didn't pull their weight. As the eliminated contestant hits the trail, the remaining thirteen breathe a sigh of relief and prepare for the next challenge.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown - Lines in the Sand: The thirteen remaining cowboys face their first immunity challenge that tests their individual skills. The contestants race to score the fastest time in barrel racing and calf roping. While most cowboys impress Trace and the judges, only one will be safe from the next elimination. For the team challenge, the cowboys take on a group of untrained horses that they have to break, saddle, and ride. In the end, it all comes down to strategy, and the team that thinks ahead takes the win. After a few choice words, teammates lock horns, determined to out-cowboy the other. When an unexpected cowboy heads home, the rest of the contestants realize every move they make counts in this competition.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The Rifleman - Outlaw's Inheritance: The townspeople of North Fork begin to get suspicious when Lucas is named as the beneficiary in the will of an infamous outlaw.

programme.title: The Old West Trading Post
programme.desc: The Old West Trading Post - Strong Box, Winchester, Spurs, Gloves, and Colt: In rugged Whitefish, Montana, the Old West is alive and kicking at Cowboy Ron's remarkable store. Along with his wife, Eila, he buys, sells, and trades authentic Western memorabilia and honors the rugged individuals who tamed America's wild frontier.

programme.title: Turquoise Fever
programme.desc: Turquoise Fever - Big Drills, Big Deals: A new client approaches the Otteson's about a big order that could lead to them being her exclusive dealer. The family works together to gather enough high-grade turquoise to make the tight deadline. While Tony and Trenton widen the pit at the Apache mine, Emily warns them of the danger, reminding them no amount of money is worth their lives. JaKell and Emily decide to join their husbands on-site to keep them safe and help them make the sale. The brothers turn to an old school technique that gives them only one chance to clear the blast zone and bring down the entire mountain. Meanwhile, at the Easter Blue mine, Tommy, Lane, and Tristan make a big blast and discover a great source of high-grade turquoise just as the buyer arrives on horseback. Can the family deliver enough product to become her exclusive dealer?

programme.desc: Confederate veteran John Chandler (Alan Ladd) returns from defeat in war to find his home razed, his wife dead and his young son, David (David Ladd), traumatized and rendered mute. Desperate to cure the boy, Chandler takes David to a small town in Illinois where he hopes to find a doctor. But, soon after the pair arrives, Chandler finds himself framed for assault -- and forced to choose between serving hard time and working for struggling local farmer Linnett Moore (Olivia de Havilland).

Unfortunately, a spill occurs a short time later, resulting in deaths and Morgan having to leave the country. A year later, he is approached by a government agent (Ron Silver) looking for a missing supply of potentially hazardous poison, which in truth hides something even more valuable.

programme.title: The Untold History Of The United States

programme.title: The Untold History Of The United States

programme.title: The Untold History Of The United States

programme.title: The Untold History Of The United States

programme.title: The Untold History Of The United States
programme.sub-title: The '50s: Eisenhower, the Bomb & the Third World
programme.desc: Eisenhower & John Foster Dulles replace Truman. Stalin dies but relations with the Soviet Union turn colder. The doctrine of nuclear annihilation are explored, as are the Korean War & U.S. rearmament.

But her recovery takes an unexpected turn when she starts experiencing eerie visions: One day, she sees a vision of a child living in the same building being hit by a car. Shortly after almost risking her life to save the child, she has yet another chilling vision about a girl living on the 7th floor being harassed by a man, and does what she can to help the girl. programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: Tommy Ryman grew up with a new-age, folk singing mother and a traditional, Lutheran insurance-agent father. This XY equation evidently equals: acclaimed comedian. Ryman has earned the title of Semifinalist on NBC's Last Comic Standing. Roseanne Barr, a professed fan, raves she has never seen anything like Tommy before in her whole life, he is one-of-a-kind, fantastic! Ryman also recently won the title of Best of the Midwest at the prestigious Gilda's Laugh Fest. Ryman's act can be described as absurdist and clever, masked behind a very likable and innocent demeanor, often thought of as awkwardly charming. He is a favorite among audiences at top clubs, corporates, and colleges around the nation.

programme.title: Danny Johnson
programme.desc: Danny Johnson's hilarious, clean stand-up has entertained audiences in comedy clubs, corporate events, and churches nationwide. Often called a cross between Jerry Seinfeld and Kevin James Danny's show is relatable, engaging, and always hilarious. Danny has starred in numerous TV commercials, Comedy Central's Laugh Riots, Florida's Funniest Comedian semi-finalist, Winner-Carnival Cruise line Comedy Challenge, Finalist in Search for the One Christian Comedy contest, and has had the pleasure of sharing the stage with Chris Rock, Bob Saget, Billy Gardell, Richard Lewis, and a variety of others. Danny has led a dual track career for over a decade achieving success in both corporate America and as a comedian. Blending his unique skill sets led to him publishing his first book, "You Stink and They Know It! A practical guide to nailing your next job interview."

programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May test the Aston Martin Rapide, the Porsche Panamera Turbo and the Maserati Quattroporte as they attempt to find the world's greatest four seat supercar. Meanwhile, Richard is on the test track in two very different muscle cars, the Chevrolet Camaro SS and Mercedes E63 AMG, and there's a double dose of celebrity as Harry Potter star Rupert Grint and F1 ace Rubens Barrichello take their turns as the stars in the Reasonably Priced Car.

programme.title: Epic Drives
programme.desc: Jonny Lieberman tours Scotland in the Bentley Continental GT V8.

programme.title: We Have to Dispose of It
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Matt hunt down a truck that's being used by a pool cleaner to engage in some illicit activities with a collection of wealthy wives. Then, Lou and Sonia find themselves in the middle of a business dispute when they try to sneak off with a catering van filled with food. And finally, Froy, Lyndah, and Matt wind up in the middle of a gang dispute when they try to repo a tricked out lowrider on the outskirts of town.

programme.title: Smart and Stupids
programme.desc: Lou and Froy repo a vehicle in a bad part of town and somebody gets punched in the face. Then, Sonia and Lyndah interrupt a tennis match to retrieve an automobile. Plus, Matt and Froy confront an out-of-control director in the middle of a shoot.

programme.title: Repo Basher vs. Matt
programme.desc: Matt, Froy, and Lou get a tip on a car whose owner has a boyfriend known for taking his fists to repossessors. Then, Lou and Matt derail an international expedition when they haul off with a tourist bus. And, Sonia and Froy bring some unwanted heat to a promotion for an energy drink by trying to repo the marketing truck.

programme.title: Tactical Planning
programme.desc: Matt and Froy walk into a moral gray area when they repossess a vehicle by stealing it. Then, Sonia and Matt discover their target van is being used in an investigation of highly toxic material. And, Matt poses as a valet to retrieve a car from an irate diner and his befuddled date.

programme.title: Four Wheel Surprise
programme.desc: First, Lou and Matt confront a big-time player and his bodyguards at a Brazilian restaurant. Then, Sonia and Lyndah head to a yard sale to get a vehicle away from the car's owner and her out-of-control friend. And finally, the whole team hits the beach in an effort to get a truck-load of ATV's away from a gang of knife-wielding beach bums.

programme.title: Breakdowns and Beatdowns
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy head into a bad part of town to find that their target car is owned by bat-equipped gang bangers. Then, a seemingly friendly teacher and an assistant principal nearly come to blows when Froy and Sonia come around to repossess one of their vehicles Then, And finally, after the tow truck breaks down on the side of the road, Lou, Matt, and Froy are left with no options and stuck in the middle of a violent dispute between some gun-wielding neighbors.

programme.title: You Again?
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Lou get the shock a lifetime when they repossess a car from an irate doctor whom they know all too well from an earlier incident. This time he's twice as angry, and he's dead-set against giving up his car again. Then, Sonia, Matt, and Lyndah go undercover as college students to extract an extremely expensive bicycle from an extremely irate athlete. And finally, Lou and Froy head to church to repossess a van from a minister with a terrible problem.

programme.title: Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: First, Lou and Froy transform their search for a small dirt bike into a quasi-reality show, getting a group of young smart-asses trapped into their own web. Then, Sonia and Matt head to the business district for a different sort of quarry - a high-end luxury tanning bed owned by a less-than-sympathetic German. And finally, Lou and Matt set up a high stakes sting operation to bust a shady tow-truck driver, but will their best-laid plans go up in smoke?

Finally Ben surprises the guests of the QANTAS Lounge at Melbourne airport with some freshly prepared canaps.

programme.title: Ben's Menu
programme.desc: At home in his kitchen Ben makes a simple Pesto Pasta before heading off on a road trip down South to see Sam Pinkard at Geronimo Aperitivo Bar & Restaurant in Launceston to learn their signature Brassica & Beetroot Salad recipe. At Oceans Retreat on the coast near Falmouth Ben makes a tasty traveller's treat KEEN'S Mustard Maple Snack Mix before relaxing with a simple breakfast of Turkish Eggs at Peppermint Ridge in Woodbridge.

programme.title: Ben's Menu
programme.desc: Cooking on location at Wineglass Bay in the Freycinet National Park, Ben flame grills some Marinated Pork Ribs. Then after a quick relocation up the coast to the White Sands Resort near Four Mile Creek Ben bakes a simple, summer Strawberry Rhubarb and Balsamic Galette before visiting Willie Smith's Organic Cidery to sample their signature Mushrooms Braised In Cider. Ben finishes the day back in his kitchen with an adults-only Beer Mac & Cheese (rpt).

programme.title: Ben's Menu
programme.desc: Ben visits Pancho Villa in Hobart for some fresh Guacamole before heading home to bake a Pesto and Pancetta Pizza at home. programme.title: Ben's Menu

Ben then takes the show on the road to visit LT at Fresh On Launceston, where he tries their ever-popular Vegetarian Burrito Bowl (rpt seg).

programme.title: Lidias Italian Table
programme.desc: Lidia grew up playing hide-and-seek in the corn fieldssurroundingher home in Pula, Istria. Making polenta at her mother's knee was almost a daily activity. Lidia teaches how to make the best basic polenta,country style. Shethendemonstratesafamily favorite: sauted polenta with field mushroomsandfollows it withthe perfectdessert: polenta with honey and fresh strawberries.

programme.title: Lidias Italian Table
programme.desc: Watching Lidia prepare her special dish of chicken with sausage, turning golden brown as the bite size pieces caramelize and nestle together in a hot skillet is a sensual experience. You can smell the aroma of garlic, olive oil, vinegar, and honey wafting through her kitchen.Lidia's second dish, country-style spring chicken with olives and potatoes, is perfect as a follow-up.

programme.title: Lidias Italian Table
programme.desc: Gnocchi is a Lidia favorite. As a child, it was a Sunday dinner staple on the Matticchio table, which Lidia helped her mother cook. The secret to great gnocchi is making it light and fluffy, then shaping it. Lidia makes two gnocchi dishes: gnocchi in Lidia's plain tomato sauce and gnocchi rolled and filled with ricotta/spinach/leek stuffing, dressed with a savory sage butter sauce.

programme.title: Lidias Italian Table
programme.desc: In Italy, a great risotto always brings a smile. Here, we all smile as Lidia prepares Risotto Milanese, a simple risotto with saffron broth, finished with butter and Parmigiano Reggiano, and Suppli di Telefono, risotto rolled into balls filled with prosciutto and mozzarella, then crisply fried. When split, the mozzarella pulls apart like telephone wires, thus the name.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Lidia prepares Frico, a specialty of her native Friuli. Frico is a pancake made by sauteing Montasio cheese in a skillet until golden brown. Lidia shows us the basic dish, and then a creative surprise. Next, it's Chicken under brick: a split chicken seared (under the weight of a brick, or heavy skillet) on the stove top until crisp-skinned, golden brown, and served immediately.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Lidia Matticchio Bastianich cooks a universal favorite, marinated lamb chops, served with a memorable sauce, prepared with fresh mint leaves, wine, stock, citrus juices and herbs. The lamb is served with scaffata -- spring legumes simmered slowly along with crispy, golden roasted potato wedges.

programme.title: MIX
programme.desc: Today Tamee heads to the sunny surfing community of Redondo Beach California to visit the sleek & sophisticated GEORGIA'S LOUNGE. Here they offer delicious small bites, classic cocktails and bartenders that will always remember your name.

programme.title: MIX
programme.desc: Today Tamee travels to Thousand Oaks CA to a bar that specializes in fresh house made ingredients locally sourced from organic farms.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Strozzapretti, literally, means priest choker. These ricotta dumpling are so good that in the vein of I'll bet you can't eat just one, the fabled priest, visiting for dinner, could not limit his intake of these little marvels. Here Lidia shares how it's made: ricotta gnocchi with radicchio trevisano sauce. To complete the meal, a zesty Italian style ricotta cheese cake.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Two very sensual dishes. For Chicken Valdostana, Lidia layers chicken breast with prosciutto, tomato, and herbs, sauted in wine and butter, adds fontina cheese, and bakes until the cheese melts, becomes golden brown. Then, Seared Pork Cutlets and peppers in a fresh marinara served over rigatoni provides an equally appealing choice.Fortunately, we get both in this episode!

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Italians are not big beef eaters. When they do indulge, it is rarely with steakexcept in Florence, where Bistecca Fiorentina is a favorite. At 2 thick, grilled over coals, with a very special anchovy, rosemary and salt rub, it is served with braised cannellini beans. Caramelized tomatoes (yes!) over vanilla ice cream for dessert it's a rich and robust dessert after Bistecca!

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Caesar Saladis a staple on the Italian-American table, even though it's origin in Mexican. Lidia's version isthe best of both, and shows us why it is probably America's most popular salad. And who doesn't loveLasagna? Lidia's is classic Italian-American Lassgna steeped in her special meat sauce.

programme.title: Bouquets and Blowtorches
programme.desc: The team returns from a successful mission in Vegas, but there's trouble brewing within the crew's ranks. Ronnie and Carlos repo from a self-defense instructor who lets his students do his dirty work, Matt and Froy confront a delinquent delivery man steeling flowers from graves, and Lou and Carlos are left defenseless against gang members with blowtorches. Can Lou still keep his cool in the high pressure repo business, or will there be repercussions for Matt and Froy that no one saw coming?

programme.title: Doomsday Prep
programme.desc: The team wonders what's up with Sonia as she wrestles with Lou's big secret. Ronnie goes undercover and takes a gold digging RO out on a date, but when Carlos lets the cat out of the bag all hell breaks loose.

programme.title: Sugardaddy Shakedown
programme.desc: The team wonders what's up with Sonia as she wrestles with Lou's big secret. Ronnie goes undercover and takes a gold digging RO out on a date, but when Carlos lets the cat out of the bag all hell breaks loose. Matt and Froy struggle with language barriers when an Italian photographer and his assistant resorts to violence because they can't comprehend. Will Sonia finally reveal what's happening, or will carrying her brother's burden get the best of her?

programme.title: The New Boss
programme.desc: Lou has retired, making Sonia the new boss, but will she be able to keep the company going without her big brother?? Matt and Ronnie try to take a car away from of yuppie with an unusual taste for red meat.

programme.title: Hayseed Inferno
programme.desc: Sonia pushes the company to repossess more than just cars, and the backlash from the team threatens to end her time in charge before it's even begun.? Ronnie and Matt attempt to repo from a reckless motocross daredevil.

programme.title: Bullseye!
programme.desc: Sonia, the new boss, is still struggling to keep the team in line, but when tragedy strikes on a routine repossession, her reign at the top faces its biggest challenge yet. Matt and Froy hit the club to take a sports car away from a deadbeat DJ.

programme.title: Phi Alpha Fail
programme.desc: Carlos goes undercover at a frat house, but when the party gets the best of him Sonia has to step in and fight the drunken mob. And when Matt and Ronnie go after some wanna-be internet sensations, they become the RO's ticket to fame in a violent potato launcher attack bound to go viral.

programme.title: Boys with Toys
programme.desc: Matt is eager to work his way onto Sonia's coveted airplane repo, despite her adamancy against him.

programme.title: Mile High Mayhem
programme.desc: On this special season finale of Operation Repo, the team gears up for a mile high repo of a lifetime! Froy and Sonia repo a water blob from a lake house, but the RO and his friends refuse to let this deflate their party. And with Sonia's hands tied, she is forced to offer Matt a position on the airplane. The team takes to the skies, but when plans go awry will Matt make the ultimate sacrifice for the team? Or will his ego force everything to spiral violently out of control?

programme.title: Reclaim the Plane
programme.desc: In the premiere of the final season of Operation Repo, the team must recover an airplane and return one-hundred thousand dollars. But after two members of the team bail when it's time to save the company, will the others be able to bounce back in time to avoid a jail sentence?

programme.title: First Rule of Repo
programme.desc: Froy and Sonia encounter a city employee who tries to give them the boot, and a mechanic's shady scheme comes crashing down on Matt and Ronnie. But with Froy still in debt to Sonia, an RO's offer to make a quick buck convinces Froy to break the first rule of repo.

programme.title: Natural Liar
programme.desc: First, Froy and Ronnie dodge tomatoes and pesticide when an organic farmer won't give up his tractor, and when they are in the clear, Froy confronts Ronnie about telling Sonia about the boob purchase and inadvertently reveals the Lambo repo. Next, Carlos and Matt get an offer of stardom from a slick Hollywood agent. And finally, Sonia drags more information from Ronnie and doesn't understand why everyone's going behind her back with Froy's big Lambo repo. Plus, they lose control of a Chevy Impala while repoing from a mace wielding shopper.

programme.title: The Froylan Job
programme.desc: A hoarder with a secret tries to pull a fast one on Matt and Froy, and Sonia takes sides in a dramatic lover's quarrel. Froy finally gets a shot at recovering the Lamborghini, but will his ingenious plan come crashing down around him?

programme.title: Tricks and Treats
programme.desc: First, a mischievous magician gets Ronnie and Carlos to stick together when they interrupt his show to grab his car. Next, Froy and Ronnie have to put hands on a seriously stupid sugar daddy and the recently upgraded debtor's chest when they repo from a stripper who will do anything to keep her car. And finally, Matt and Carlos go head to head against a boxing manager and his fight fixing fighter.

programme.title: Ryan's World
programme.desc: Ryan experiments and builds cool creations with cardboard in these hands-on science projects and DIY crafts!

programme.title: Change Of Address
programme.desc: When Stephanie's mom leaves her in charge of their house for a few days, it's finally Stephanie's chance to prove she can handle responsibility alone. Naturally, everything that can go wrong does go wrong especially when the entire house disappears! When Stephanie's mom leaves her in charge of their house for a few days, it's finally Stephanie's chance to prove she can handle responsibility alone. But after fending off Andrea's party plans, a Home Alone-style break-in (by the hapless Snivel, trying to retrieve incriminating evidence of the Mayor's latest scheme), and finally the entire house disappearing (Uh, think Stephanie's Mom will notice?), Stephanie comes to appreciate that responsibility is a lot harder than it looks.

programme.title: Ninjaball Run
programme.desc: When the ninja learn that Darreth's Mojo Dojo is to be destroyed and Darreth doesn't have the money to save it, our heroes enter the annual NinjaBall Run to win its cash prize in order to save the dojo. As Lloyd continues to train and unlock his hidden powers, the Ninja learn land developers are going to destroy Darreth's Mojo Dojo unless Darreth can find the money to save it. The Ninja decide to enter their Ninja Tank into the annual NinjaBall Run cross-country rally to try to win its cash prize. Revisiting past characters who also enter the race, the high-speed derby will only grow more dangerous as Garmadon enters his Black Bounty, realizing this is the perfect chance to use his Mega-Weapon and rid the ninja. In the end, the Ninja will discover a few secrets within their Ninja Tank, allowing them to beat Garmadon's Bounty by a millisecond and saving Darreth's Dojo with their well-deserved cash prize. And as a final surprise, the Ninja steal back the Destiny's Bounty and make it their own once again.

programme.title: Knight Out
programme.desc: When the other NEXO-Knights decide they need a vacation from Clay, they send him on a holiday not knowing that he's going to a resort that houses an evil book or that Jestro will be heading there, too. Clay needs a vacation. Or, actually, the knights need a vacation from Clay! Clay is so super-focused that sometimes they just can't take it: training, training, maintenance, the Knights' Code tests thenmore training. Even Merlok 2.0 is exhausted and he has no physical form! So, the Knights send Clay off on a holiday against his will (arranged by Lance because if there's one thing he can do it's plan a vacation.) But unbeknownst to the other Knights, Jestro and the Book of Monsters are tracking an evil book. A book that they suspect is located near the resort Exalted Towers renowned for its exquisite service, where Clay is staying. It's the BOOK OF CRUELTY and Clay notices that it's affecting the high class resort where Lance has booked him: the service is terrible, the staff is nasty, and everyone seems to take joy in being cruel to him (and to each other.) Meanwhile, the other Knights are having a terrible time because they realize that Clay takes charge of the basic maintenance of almost everything in the Fortrex. Stuff starts breaking down, chores are not getting done and everyone is getting on each other's nerves. Clay senses things are off at the resort, and discovers the book they've been using as the guest register is really the Book of Cruelty. As Clay scoops it up, he looks outside to seeJestro and his monsters arrive on the Evilmobile. Clay battles as best he can on his own by setting traps and being cunning but he's finally caught. Just when it looks like this will be the cruelest vacation ever the other Knights arrive on their vehicles! They spring into action, free Clay, and battle and defeat Jestro and the monsters though Jestro escapes. The Knights make Clay promise to never go on vacation again.

programme.title: Dive In
programme.desc: Working summer jobs at the new Heartlake City Pool, Restaurant and Sports Center is fun and games for the Friends until singing mermaid Andrea gets her very first teenage crush. The Friends each try to help, with disastrous results. Working summer jobs at the new Heartlake City Pool, Restaurant and Sports Center is fun and games for the Friends until singing mermaid Andrea gets her very first teenage crush. He's Tad, the new lifeguard, and just the sight of him reduces the normally fearless Andrea to a babbling wimp. The Friends all try to help her out, with less-than stellar results, each attempt resulting in increasing mayhem for Tad until he's terrified of Andrea. Then Andrea discovers that she's been mooning over the wrong boy all along!

programme.title: Child's Play
programme.desc: When the Ninja interrupt Lord Garmadon from using his Mega-Weapon to turn back the clock' and bring to life the fossils of a monster, the Ninja are accidentally hit and turned into kids and are now forced to enlist Lloyd's help to battle the awakened monster. Tired of intense training, Lloyd yearns to play and enjoy his youth. The Ninja remind Lloyd that along with great power, comes great responsibility. When the Ninja interrupt Lord Garmadon from using his Mega-Weapon to turn back the clock' and bring to life the fossils of a monster, the Ninja are accidentally hit and soon discover they've been turned into kids! Seeking Lloyd's help and relying on childhood antics, the five ninja kids must destroy the reawakened monster that's hunting them in the city. In the end, Lloyd makes the difficult decision and sacrifices his youth in order to save them from the beast, turning forward the clock and turning Lloyd into a young man. Sensei Wu fears now that since Lloyd is young man, the final battle of good versus evil approaches sooner than he had ever expected.

programme.title: Saturday Knight Fever
programme.desc: The Book of Monsters catching a cold means trouble for the NEXO-Knights when he can create an entirely new kind of snotty monster. King and Queen Halbert have journeyed to the town of Cleanington to open the brand new Scrubbery Barn at the invitation of Roger the Scrubber (seen in 104.) Meanwhile, the Book of Monsters drags Jestro to Snottingham one of the coldest places in Knighton where everyone coughs, has a runny nose and is generally under-the-weather. The BOM demands that Jestro feed him a snotheiser ball which will probably make him sick. The BOM explains that if he is sick, he may just produce a whole new breed of magical monsters some that the knights would NEVER expect. The BOM gets sick and starts coughing up phlegm globlins and bloblins. The Knights arrive, alerted to what they think is an attack on the town by Snottingham's mayor, Hack Coughmeier. The sickened, sneezy, snotty monsters infect the knights and, more importantly, the knights' NEXO-Shields. Now their NEXO-Powers are infected. As they try to download something to fight the monsters, they realize the powers they get are off strange, infected versions of their powers. The knights drive Jestro and his snot monsters off and they turn in for the night. And, overnight, they all get sick. Meanwhile, the BOM order a nice, hot lava bathhe'll feel fine by morning. But the knights wake-up with colds and they feel terrible. Ava and Merlok 2.0 thinks it will pass in a day or twoit's just a typical Snottingham cold. Each knight gets sick in their own funny way and their illnesses play right into Jestro and the BOM's hands: they're headed to Cleanington to kidnap the king! The citizens of the ultra-clean city hate the sight of monsters, but then feel caught in between when the sick, sneezy, snotty knights arrive on their Fortrex. The fight goes terribly for the knights. They try to download the Nexo-power Glorious Griffon but instead get just feathers. So they improvise and tickle the monsters! Ava finally comes up with a way to use some anti-virus tools on their NEXO-Shields and just as Jestro is about to take the king and queen away, the NEXO-Knights get their normal powers back! They defeat Jestro and save the king and queen.

programme.title: I Told You So
programme.desc: Confined to a wheelchair after a failed Halloween attempt to prove herself a reporter, What's At Heart photographer Emma sees strange goings-on through her hospital window. She's convinced the neighbors are jewel thieves, but no one believes her till the bad guys come after her! To show her Friends on the What's At Heart school paper that she's more than just a photographer, Emma investigates a scary old house on Halloween eve -- only to take a tumble and land in the hospital. There, confined to a wheelchair, she observes mysterious goings-on through her window which convince her that the neighbors are jewel thieves. Her friends, though dubious, agree to check it out. But after nearly getting caught by the neighbors, they come up empty and decide it's all just Emma's imagination. Meanwhile, up in Maternity, Sophie's having a baby! The girls run out, leaving Emma alone. And that's when the bad guys decide to pay Emma a visit

programme.title: Wrong Place, Wrong Time
programme.desc: When Garmadon travels back in time in order to undo the past and rid the Ninja from the future, the Ninja follow him and try to stop him by using the Golden Weapons from the past to clash against Garmadon's Mega-Weapon. In his most villainous attempt at using the Mega-Weapon, Lord Garmadon creates a vortex through space and time to return to the moment Wu first arrives to recruit Kai to become a ninja (Episode 1, 2011) in order to rid the ninja from the future. The Ninja follow him back in time, only to make the mistake in saving Nya from the Skeletons. Suddenly, Past Kai doesn't have a need to become a ninja, so our current day heroes must fix the past to save their futures. The stakes rise as Garmadon catches wind the Ninja have followed him back in time and plans a dangerous trap. In a final battle, the ninja use the Golden Weapons from the past to clash against Garmadon's Mega-Weapon, causing all of the legendary weapons to shoot off into the night sky. In the end, our heroes return back to the present and learn the Mega-Weapon has ceased to exist because it was destroyed in the past, leaving them all without their elemental powers.

programme.title: Open Mike Knight
programme.desc: The Book of Betrayal leads Jestro and his Monsters to Funnyton the funnies town in the kingdom. When they Knights arrive to capture him, they discover (to their shock) that Jestro and the Book of Monsters are now the town's top comedians! Jestro and his monsters are in attack formation moving to pillage the town of Funnyton. But when they arrive, ready to tear into the place, they see that nobody's in town. Then, they hearlaughter?! The entire town is there listening to a stand-up comic JOKES KNIGHTLY. He's hilarious. He commands such power, such attention, and such loyalty. Jestro and the BOM decide they must become funny. They order all kinds of book on comedy from Spamazon: books on parody, irony, insult humor, slapstick, satire, knock-knock jokes, elephant jokes, my monster is so fat jokes, etc. They work-up a ventriloquist act with the BOM sitting on Jestro's lap. They start doing their act and, surprisingly, they're funny. They're very funny. The Fortrex arrives and the knights rush out, ready for battle. They fight through a string of monsters just outside the town, but discover they're only working as bouncers to keep too many people out of the comedy club. (Sorry, you guys aren't on the list.) The knights hear loud laughs and head there. In the club, they discover the town isn't being held hostage, they're in the show voluntarily having a great time. AndJestro and the BOM are funny. Meanwhile, during the show, Jokes Knightly decides he'll steal the BOM and Jestro's act. During the intermission at the comedy show, Clay comes backstage to talk to Jestro. Maybe, Clay says, this shows that Jestro doesn't have to be badhe is funny, like Clay always said he was. Meanwhile, Jokes Knightly steals the BOM and Jestro can't find it. He panics. Clay encourages himgo on stage alone, be funnyhe can do it! Jestro goes out and is funny on his own he hits all his punchlines, he gets big laughs he starts to see that Clay is right. The BOM sees that Jokes Knightly has a joke book that turns out to be the BOOK OF BETRAYAL. That's how Mike Knight has become so funny by stealing everyone's material! BOM calls in Magmar, who saves him from Mike Knight AND takes the Book of Betrayal. As Jestro comes off-stage to great applause, the BOM tells him they have the Book of Betrayal. The BOM calls in Magmar and his monsters and they start a fight as Clay comes to Jestro's defense and calls on the other Knights for backup. A big battle ensues that destroys the comedy club in Funnyton. The Knights win and drive-off Magmar, the monsters and the BOM. As they retreat, the BOM looks around: Where's my Jestro?! Jestro sneaked away during the fight and is in a nearby forest withthe Book of Betrayal.

programme.title: Snow Way
programme.desc: Practicing for the local snow lodge's big snowboard race, Mia has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no biggie, but when she tries to resume practice, the normally fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! At the local snow lodge's Snowboard Meet, ace snowboarder Mia, trying to raise money for a new Heartlake City animal shelter, enters the fiercest race of all the Boardercross. Then, while practicing, she has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no big deal, but once she heals and tries to resume practice, the usually fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! With the help of her Friends, she tries hard to overcome her fear, but her nightmarish visions of snowboard monsters and jeering snowmen have her shaking in her bed. She backs out of the race, disappointing her Friends and herself. Finally, when an avalanche traps Fiona, Mia is forced to overcome her fears and race to the rescue.

programme.title: The Stone Army
programme.desc: The ninja face off with an exhibit of a Stone Samurai Warrior that the toxic venom from the Great Devourer has brought to life while Garmadon manages to find a fabled Dark Island that is said to hold dark powers. Lord Garmadon struggles controlling the Serpentine now that he is without the Mega-Weapon. His latest endeavor is to lead the snakes in search of a fabled Dark Island that ancient texts say holds dark powers. Unable to find the island, the furious Serpentine abandon Lord Garmadon out at sea. Meanwhile, Lloyd and the Ninja are called to the museum to find the toxic venom from the Great Devourer has seeped into the ground beneath the city, and it's brought an exhibit of a Stone Samurai Warrior to life! Our heroes come across Misako, Lloyd's long lost mother. She's an archeologist in search of stopping the prophesized battle between Lloyd and his father. She had unearthed the Stone Warrior, and shares how it was once part of an indestructible army created by a dark spirit named The Overlord. When the balance is altered and evil is let into Ninjago, it will allow the Overlord to return and bring darkness and destruction to the land. Unable to destroy the Terminator-like Stone Warrior, the Ninja cleverly trap it. In the end, Lord Garmadon awakens on a small island at sea and hears the voice of the banished Overlord, promising him his wildest dreams. Garmadon uses his four hands to activate a mechanism, raising a lost land from out of the sea, creating a Yin/Yang symbol with Ninjago. The ultimate battle between good and evil begins to unfold.

programme.title: The Fortrex And The Furious
programme.desc: In a massive chase around Knighton, the NEXO-Knights attempt to keep the Book of Betrayal out of the Book of Monster's grip. But the evil book is persistent. Will he get the final piece of his evil puzzle? We finally REVEAL that Jestro has given the Book of Betrayal toClay. He tells Clay what it is and how Mike Knight used it. And it seems that the Book of Monsters believed it to be the final ingredient in some Master Plan. Suddenly, they realize Monsters led by Magmar and the super-mad Book of Monster are after them! Clay retreats with Jestro and the Book of Betrayal to rendezvous with the other Knights at the Fortrex. The Fortrex isn't fast enough they'll need their own vehicles. They decide that they need to split up and go in multiple directions to make the monsters expend their resources on a chase. It's a huge chase, being covered like a crazy news event by the Knighton News Network. We see a montage of the monsters stopping and capturing all the Knights vehicles: Aaron, Macy, Lancefinally Axl. However, as they do, they realize that the Knights have used Squirebots in Jestro Fan Jester hats (from the vendor at the comedy club in 108) as decoys. They think Axl has the Book of Betrayal in his BRICK containment unit, but it turns out to be the Ned Knightly Comic from episode 203. The Monsters finally corner Clay, who has the real Jestro and Book of Betrayal in his sword vehicle. Before Clay can protest, Jestro pushes the launch button and fires off Clay in the vehicle's rocket sword. The monsters race off with Jestro, leaving the shocked Clay fearing for his friend. Now, Magmar tells the Book of Monsters, they only need to get BOB. Clay makes his way back to the Fortrex and tells what has happened. They decide they must get to the Redoubt of Ruination in the Lava Lands and try to save Jestro. Meanwhile, we see, INTERCUT, a scene where Merlok 2.0 and the Book of Monsters explain the Books of Evil, how they were created and what the BOM will use them for. Merlok, back in the day, split the evil MONSTRUX into 10 magic books to keep him from ever being a threat. Only, he didn't destroy the booksand now the BOM has them and Monstrux can come back into the world! Meanwhile, the BOM has set up the huge, ceremonial arena at their HQ so they can have the ceremony to bring Monstrux back into the world. Jestro realizes he's been a pawn of the Book of Monsters. Jestro says he'll never get the Book of Betrayalthe Knights have it. In the last scene, we see Clay taking the Book of Betrayal from the Fortrex, climbing into his vehicle and driving towardsthe Redoubt of Ruination! Has the Book of Betrayal worked its evil magic on him?!

programme.title: Midwinter Night's Dream
programme.desc: When Emma accidentally causes Olivia to lose an important science prize, a furious Olivia breaks off her friendship with Emma and the other Friends. But after a New Year's Eve dream, in which a living, breathing Zobo takes her on a tour of her past, present and potential future, Olivia is reminded that friendship is the most valuable prize of all. Today is the most important day of Olivia's life. Not because tonight is New Year's Eve, but it's also the day of the annual Robotics Challenge, when teen scientists compete to build the best robot and win a full university scholarship. Olivia has spent the whole year preparing her entry: an all-new, high-tech, flying Aviator Zobo. It's a sure winner until Emma accidentally sabotages it and wins the trophy herself! Furious, Olivia breaks off her friendship with Emma and the other Friends (for defending Emma), and stomps out in tears. That night, in a dream, a living, breathing Aviator Zobo takes her on a tour of her life past, present and potential future to remind her that friendship is the most valuable prize of all.

programme.title: The Day Ninjago Stood Still
programme.desc: The ninja try to flee from the rest of the Stone Army that has been brought to life by the Devourer's toxic venom - and things get a lot worse when Garmadon arrives with a Helmet of Darkness' and seizes control of the Stone Army. Scales finally takes leadership over the Serpentine and plans to burrow beneath Ninjago City to level it to the ground. But as they burrow, they run into a lost chamber holding the rest of the Stone Army. The Devourer's toxic venom in the ground brings the Stone Army to life, sealing the Serpentine in their tomb, and returning the snakes back to where they were first found. On the Dark Island, the Overlord directs Lord Garmadon to a giant celestial clock. Garmadon removes a Helmet of Darkness', which will grant the wearer control over the Stone Army, and also activate the clock to tick down to when the final battle will begin. Back in Ninjago City, the indestructible Stone Army surfaces and attacks, and the Ninja know the only thing they can do is to save as many people as they can. They manage to barely escape with other townspeople, only for the Destiny's Bounty's engines to get damaged. In the end, Lord Garmadon arrives with the helmet, and seizes control of the Stone Army.

programme.title: Kingdom Of Heroes
programme.desc: The Book of Monsters, having the final pieces of his evil plan in place, tries to take human form. Can the NEXO-Knights and Merlok 2.0 stop the greatest threat they've ever faced? Or will the kingdom be plunged into darknessforever. The Redoubt of Ruination readies the final ceremony to call forth MONSTRUX, the arch-necromancer of the past. Clay, holding the Book of Betrayal walks to the gates of the spooky place. Inside, Clay hears strangesinging and music. It's like a twisted Broadway show of some kind. Meanwhile, the Knights all realize Clay is gone and so is the Book of Betrayal. Macy says Clay must be up to something. They have to trust him and, more importantly, they have to find him. At the Redoubt of Ruination the ceremony has already begun! The Book of Monsters wants the final ceremony that calls forth Monstrux to be like a really great show! The BOM then barfs up all the BOOKS OF EVIL into their places around Jestro. He's just missing the BOOK OF BETRAYAL, which Clay has. Clay says he'll trade the book for Jestro. The BOM immediately agrees to the deal and sets Jestro free. Then, Monsters grab-up Clay, restrain him, and put him in Jestro's place on the sacrifice stone. From outside, they're interrupted by the sounds of battle the Knights have arrived on the Fortrex and are attacking the Redoubt of Ruination. In the confusion, Jestro slips away. The BOM lets loose with a powerful protection spell to keep the Knights out as he starts with the ceremonyhe's going to bring Monstrux out and remanifest him in Clay's body! Jestro is able to escape the Redoubt and make his way to the Knights, who can't seem to battle their way in. It's a race against time as the Knights try to get in and save Clay. As the Knights get in, they see that the crazy BOM is absorbing all the Books of Evil, one-by-one. He grows BIGGER and BIGGER! Macy calls for NEXO-Powerbut it's not enough! The gigantic Book of Monsters sucks down the final book, the Book of Betrayal! He looms over Clay, about to consume him, too, and make him into Monstrux! Suddenly, Robin appears carrying TECHKALIBERhe tosses it to Clay. Just as the huge Book of Monsters falls on Clay, he holds up Techkaliber and Merlok 2.0 is therehis full power in the sword. Clay sticks the sword into the Book of Monster's huge mouth. BOOM! There's a BIG, MAGICAL EXPLOSION! As we cut back inside, we see the Book of Monsters is gone. The Knights release Clay and he thanks them and Jestro for saving him. Jestro thanks them all for saving him and seeing the good in him. WE DISSOLVE TO: The JoustDome. In a final ceremony the King and Queen reward the knights and congratulate them for keeping the kingdom safe. There are speeches, happiness and friendship. And Jestro even does a bit that's funny. At the very end we see a hint of somethingMonstrux and the Book of Monsters are still out there.

programme.title: The Last Voyage
programme.desc: The Ninjas, Lloyd, Sensei Wu and Misako journey to the Dark Island to find a Temple of Light' that can restore the Ninjas' elemental powers but are attacked by Starteeth (barnacle-like star fish) that start eating through their ship. The Stone Army and Lord Garmadon have disappeared, and our heroes can see the mysterious Dark Island off their coastline. Fearing Garmadon is up to no good, Sensei Wu has the whole team suit up to begin a journey to the Dark Island. Since the Bounty's engines are damaged, they plan to go by sea. Misako reveals her ancient scrolls state of a Temple of Light' that could return the Ninja's elemental powers, and it could be found on the island. Meanwhile, Lord Garmadon has the Army mining for more Dark Matter', using it to build a Super-Weapon that will recreate Ninjago in a twisted evil way. When a storm hits at sea, our heroes are attacked by Starteeth (barnacle-like starfish that can eat through a ship) and are forced to find refuge on a lighthouse at sea. Inside, Zane discovers his inventor father, the Tinkerer, is alive! Together, they repair the Bounty so it can fly again, escaping a giant Leviathan, and soaring to the Dark Island ahead.

programme.title: The Cloud
programme.desc: A storm is brewing over Knighton. Monstrox has taken the form of a cloud, and is raising an army of lightning infused Stone Monsters. His first target is the new Lavalands Amusement Park. Harmony reigns in Knighton as the Knights pursue their civilian lives: Lance has a TV talk show Axl is the singing chef on the show Jestro is the weatherman Clay is teaching at the Knights' Academy Macy, Ava and Merlok 2.0 travel the land in the Fortrex making sure the kingdom's defenses are ready (part of a plan she and Clay have) Aaron and his hover shield is travelling the land setting extreme records. Robin is at his workshop at the Knights' Academy doing an independent study he's working on some top secret project for Merlok 2.0. It all seems excellent! We even see the Knights new vehicles which have been optimized for civilian life (except for Clay's.) But storm clouds are brewing. Well, one storm cloud is brewing: the Cloud of Monstrox! Yes, the Book of Monsters has reconstituted himself and is now a cloud who needs a man on the ground to enact his new evil plan. He follows his old buddy Jestro as he goes across the realm on the weekends apologizing for being evil. ZAP! With one bolt of his evil magic lighting, the Cloud of Monstrox turns Jestro evil again (only this time a bit, well, too evil.) The evil duo are back together and bring stone to life for the first time in the form of Gargoyles from the town of GHOULIA. Now they must gather the Forbidden Powers so that the Cloud of Monstrox can destroy the entire kingdom! A battle breaks out in the Lava Lands, where Lance and Alice Squires are reporting from the opening of the Cuthbert Richmond funded Lava Lands Amusement Park, rebuilt from the remains of Jestro's old HQ. Jestro and the Cloud are after something in the remains and as Merlok 2.0 sends out a call for the Knights to help Lance. Can Lance (with an assist from King Halbert in his Mech) hold-off Jestro, the Cloud and their new army of stone fighters?!

programme.title: S01 E013
programme.sub-title: Thunder Girl's Basket, The Frozen Trunk, The Invitation - Guess What
programme.desc: EP37: While Thunder Fairy is sliding down the toboggan with Anoki, the puppy Hot Dog steals from him the basket of food. EP38: When Tijinou and Tijibelle arrive on a magic train on the edge of the ice. programme.title: S01 E01
programme.sub-title: Sausage Wants To Play, Hilda Wants To Fly, A Snack For Hilda - Guess What

Tijinou and Tijibelle set out looking for him.EP02: When Tijinou and Tijibelle arrive, Violette's farm is in turmoil. In fact, Hilda the hen decided it was time to fly.EP03: Just as Tijinou and Tijibelle arrive at the Farm, Violette entrusts them with a little bag. It's Odile the hen's party. But which way should they go to find Odile ?

programme.title: S01 E13
programme.sub-title: Betrayus Turns the Heat Up - PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures
programme.desc: PacWorld is becoming dangerously hot and its citizens mistakenly blame Sir C! Pac and Friends remain loyal to the elderly inventor and, together they uncover a plot by Betrayus to terra-form PacWorld into a world just like the Netherworld prior to invasion and conquest.

programme.title: S01 E14
programme.sub-title: Pac-Pong Fever - PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures
programme.desc: The annual Pacolympics approach and allow for Aunt Spheria to reignite a Pac-Pong rivalry with her former Pac-Pong rival and wanna-be suitor - Lord Betrayus. Let the games begin!

programme.title: Festival Of Sugary Sweets
programme.desc: When a sugar shortage threatens the annual Festival of Sugary Sweets, the Lalaloopsy friends devise a delicious way to save the day and discover that when you work together as a team, you can make something really special.

programme.title: S03 E08
programme.sub-title: The Berry Best Treasure - Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: Cherry Jam is being driven to distraction! She can't finish a song that she promised to write for a singing group, thanks to the earsplitting noise from Berrykin construction crews who are trying to find the sparkleberry juice blockage that has shut down the town's power. Strawberry can't cook in the caf, Lemon's hair salon appliances are running out of controllife in Berry Bitty City is impossible! Strawberry rallies their spirits by suggesting a fun way for them to spend the day out of town: a treasure hunt! She describes a game where the girls divide into two teams, and each team creates fun written clues for the other that lead to funny objects the girls must collect.

programme.title: S03 E09
programme.sub-title: The Berry Scary Fun Adventure - Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: With the power completely out in Berry Bitty City, the girls go on a camping trip to be out of the way of the Berrykin work crews. Lemon is nervous because she believes there is a creepy creature in the forest (that she read about in a book Blueberry loaned her), and the girls get the nervous bug, but Strawberry turns their apprehension into fun by daring her friends to stay out in the woods the longest! Rallied by a sense of competition and adventure, the girls divide into three groups and set up tentseach convinced they will be the bravest group. They each come up with diverting activities to distract themselves.

programme.title: S02 E02
programme.desc: To win gold at the Ooze-lympics, Avery goes to Chef Dufflet Rosenberg's kitchen to make Molten Chocolate Lava Cake. Lily gets fresh honey at a bee farm. For the final event, Matt challenges them to make extra-oozy, stuffed pizzas.

programme.sub-title: Foods that are Hot - Taste Buds
programme.desc: Lily drops in on Chef Lily Pottinger to make a classic spicy Jamaican dish, Jerk Chicken. Avery tests his tolerance for hot peppers at a hot sauce store. Then it's back to the kitchen to see whose fiery wings will bring Matt to tears.

programme.title: Band Together

programme.title: S03 E10
programme.sub-title: The Berry Lucky Day - Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: The girls are driven to distraction by their frisky puppies frolicking all over Berry Bitty City! Full of energy and thinking that everything in town is a toy for them to play with, they cause comical mayhem wherever they go. Strawberry suggests the pups need a place of their own where they can playa dog park! The girls decide to call in Huckleberry, who runs an animal hotel in Berry Big City, to help design the park. With Huck on his way, Cherry practices her singing. She believes her ability to hit a perfect high note is the result of a good luck charma beautiful crystal that she keeps in her pocket. Although Strawberry says singing isn't about luck, but about practice and hard work, Cherry isn't convinced.

programme.title: S03 E11
programme.sub-title: All Dogs Allowed - Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: The girls plan a formal afternoon lawn party tea to inaugurate their new dog park. Plum is in charge of decorations, Cherry music, and Strawberry snacks. There's even a giant, dog-shaped ice sculpture. As the girls get dressed, Raspberry puts the finishing touches on the high-fashion hats that will accompany their beautiful gowns. At last everything is ready. But when the gate opens... the puppies back away! For some strange reason, they want nothing to do with the dog park! No matter how the girls call them to come in, the pups hesitate and back away, with worried whines. Cherry tries to tempt them by hiding doggie treats around the park, but the pups just run in, snatch the treats and run out. Debate begins about why the pups won't enter the park. Everyone has their own theory. Strawberry wonders if something is scaring them. Blueberry concludes it's Lemon's ice sculpture.

programme.title: Angry Planet | Italia Wild
programme.desc: Italy is one of the very few nations in the world that regularly gets three major extreme natural phenomena volcanos, flooding, and avalanches. Eastern flanks of the volcano to slip by up to two metres, and many houses on the flanks of the volcano experienced structural damage. The eruption also completely destroyed the Rifugio Sapienza, on the southern flank of the volcano. The Rifugio was the site of a cable car station which had previously been destroyed in the 1983 eruption both have now been rebuilt. The most recent eruption was in November 2006.

programme.title: Angry Planet | Kenya
programme.desc: Definitely our wildest episode so far. Heres the deal: Mt.Elgon is an 14,000 foot volcano in eastern Kenya. We propose a safari/ascent of the dormant volcano. Heres the first kicker:High on the the flanks of the volcano is Kitum Cave a cave created by the most unique form of erosion Elephant Erosion. For millennia elephants have been going into the cave to carve it out with thir tusks in order to eat the salty rock.Heres the second kicker: the cave is thought to be the home of the Ebola Marberg virus the worlds most deadly virus.So heres the plan: We are going enter the cave, at night, wearing full Bio-Hazard suits to protect us from the virus.

programme.title: Angry Planet | By Camel to Timbuktu
programme.desc: It is time for Angry Planet to do a serious desert episode. What better place to do it than this fabled city in the middle of the mighty Sahara Desert.This almost mythical place really does exist. And it really is still possible to travel there by camel caravan, riding the infamous Ships of the Desert. Extreme heat, dehydration, possible sand storms, frigid night temperatures and desert predators are our potential companions for the trip.

programme.title: Angry Planet | Indian Monsoon
programme.desc: In June of next year we plan to intercept the Monsoon as it hits southern India and makes its way north along the western shore past Goa and Mumbai up to Delhi.This most famous of torrential rainy seasons drops as much as 40 feet of water on parts of the parched sub-continent.
